name: Druid
description: Druid is an adventure game with different puzzles and riddles where you play as a druid who searches for a wise master and helps to magic forest dwellers. Overcome all obstacles to find your teacher!
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Windows XP/Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 10 Процессор: 2.0+ GHz Оперативная память: 2 GB ОЗУ Видеокарта: Radeon HD5450 or better; 256 MB or higher DirectX: Версии 9.0c Место на диске: 250 MB Звуковая карта: 100% DirectX9.0c compatible sound card and drivers
